revised_title: Pericellular Environment and its Regulation in Vertebrate Tissues
tldr: The article discusses the relationship between connective tissue cells and intercellular substances, including basement membranes. It explains how disturbances in the pericellular environment can lead to changes in basement membrane structure and function. The authors illustrate this by referring to diseases affecting the basement membranes in the glomeruli of the kidney and alveoli of the lung.
